ingredients: 1 cup 2% plain Greek yogurt (do not use non-fat)
3, 11-ounce cans Mexican-style corn (sometimes called Fiesta corn)
4 large or 6 thin green onions, sliced (white and green parts)
Cholula or similar hot sauce, optional for serving
Cholula or similar hot sauce, optional for serving
Fritos Scoops, for serving (mandatory, according to Elaine)
